title: A grieving father was insulted and shooed away by Jharkhand CM Raghubar Das
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
In a shocking incident, Jharkhand’s BJP CM Raghubar Das insulted a grieving father who had come to meet him to ask for justice for his daughter and the CM shooed him off the stage. The said incident happened during a Woman’s day event which the CM was attending. Sanjay Singh, whose daughter Ichchita Singh according to police version has committed suicide, had come to the function to request the CM to investigate the issue as Sanjay Singh believes that this was not a case of suicide. However, when Sanjay Singh got up on the stage and tried to talk, the CM flew into a rage and said the follow:

On March 3rd, 2017, 20-year-old girl Ichchita Singh, a medical college aspirant, was found dead. Ichchita, a resident of Daltonganj, was preparing for medical entrance examination at a local coaching centre. The girl’s father had lodged a police complaint stating that he suspected Ichchita’s case to be a case of murder and not suicide.

This is not an isolated case of Raghubir Das’s overreach. While delivering a speech in December 2015, Raghubar Das had ordered the suspension of District Commissioner of Bokaro Steel City for walking past him.
